channel.title: [508] 90% G.E Work HELP!
channel.description: Hello guys im two steps away from having a fully grand-exchange but i need help... I want it to load a cfg file to the things here what i need: [code] public void GERead(Player p, p.GEitem, p.GEMany, p.GEMoney, p.GEMin, p.GEMax, p.GEMed) { BufferedReader in = new BufferedReader(new FileReader("./data/GE.cfg")); }[/code] i want it to be like this [code]GE = 100 1 1000 800 1200 1000[/code] but it sets it correctly like once it load it sets GEitem to 100 GEMany to 1 GEMoney to 1000 ... to end

item.title: [508] 90% G.E Work HELP!
item.dc:creator: @angel_in_war angel in war
item.description:
@angel_in_war wrote:

Hello guys im two steps away from having a fully grand-exchange but i need help…
I want it to load a cfg file to the things
here what i need:

public void GERead(Player p, p.GEitem, p.GEMany, p.GEMoney, p.GEMin, p.GEMax, p.GEMed) { BufferedReader in = new BufferedReader(new FileReader("./data/GE.cfg")); }
i want it to be like this

GE = 100 1 1000 800 1200 1000

but it sets it correctly
like once it load it sets
GEitem to 100
GEMany to 1
GEMoney to 1000
… to end

Read full topic
